story_text: Claire and her bear sat on a chair and looked up at the sky to watch the colorful hot air balloons rising in the air.
They felt the cool air and noticed a pair of birds building a nest in a big tree nearby.
story_images: Claire and her teddy bear sitting on a wooden chair in a grassy field, watching vibrant hot air balloons floating up in the sky.
A gentle breeze ruffling the leaves of a large tree with two birds busy building a nest, as Claire and her bear watch from below.

questions.question: What did Claire and her bear see in the sky?
What did the pair of birds do?
